name: Vidzor
tag_list: interactive-video, video, videos, video-linking, interactivity, questionnaires, vote, forms
overview:
Vidzor is an online interactive video platform that allows anyone to effortlessly create and publish interactive html5 videos on the web.

Publishers can remix storylines through video-linking, drag-and-drop custom forms, questionnaires, and opinion polls to put online viewers and your video into conversation.

Through our analytics dashboard your brand will amass valuable feedback to facilitate understanding of the viewer experience based on their preferences, feedback and engagement.
